name: AVGN Game [unfinished fragment]
description:
HERE BE DRAGONS: This is a game that was never meant to be released in this state. As such, the quality may be subpar and the game might be full of bugs. It might even randomly crash.

A game submitted to the Fragment Jam. This is a game that was never finished meant for another game jam.

It's VERY rough and the enemies abruptly stop spawning, leaving you in limbo. Force quit the game with ALT+F4 or the equivalent for your OS to escape. Playing windowed also allows you to quit easily.

Controls:
Arrow Keys: Move around
X: Shoot
C: Use selected powerup (top bar)
